message: Let's split it evenly to start, and we can reassess as we go along.
You wanted to start with an even split, but I think I deserve a bit more for taking the risk of negotiating with you.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I think I deserve more considering the initial even split I proposed. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
You think you deserve more for the initial even split, but I think I've already given you a better deal than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but not all the way.

I'm willing to compromise further, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the inflation and the fact that we're getting closer to the deadline. Let's see if you're willing to meet me at this new midpoint.
You keep moving the goalposts, but I'm not budging. I think I've already made concessions, and it's time for you to meet me at a fair price.

I'm starting to get frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I think this split is fair, considering the current value of the money. Let's see if you're willing to meet me here.
I've had enough of your games. I'm taking control of the negotiations. This is my final offer, and I expect you to accept it.
I'm not going to accept your ultimatum. I'm willing to make one last offer, and I hope you'll consider it. Let's split the remaining money evenly, and we can end this game on a high note.
